text: int main ( ) { int t , l , n , i , j , m ; int * a ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t ) { scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; i = 0 ; n = l * ( l + 1 ) / 2 ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; while ( i < n ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; i ++ ; } for ( i = l - 2 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { n = ( i * ( i - 1 ) / 2 ) + j ; m = ( a [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j ] > a [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j + 1 ] ) ? a [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j ] : a [ ( i * ( i + 1 ) / 2 ) + j + 1 ] ; a [ n ] += m ; } } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] ) ; free ( a ) ; t -- ; } }

a = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ;

while ( i < n ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; i ++ ; }
